sharingd(8) System Manager's Manual sharingd(8)

NAME

sharingd —
Sharing Daemon that enables AirDrop, Handoff, Instant Hotspot, Shared Computers, and Remote Disc in the Finder.

SYNOPSIS

sharingd

DESCRIPTION

sharingd is used by the Finder to enable AirDrop file sharing, Handoff between iCloud devices, Instant Hotspot discovery, connecting to shared computers, and accessing Remote Discs from other computers.

FILES

/usr/libexec/sharingd

HISTORY

sharingd first appeared in Mac OS X 10.9 and iOS 7.
12/15/12 Darwin
